name: Monster Shopper
description:
Monster Shopper

Image being a werewolf... 

... having to go shopping.

Mr. Werewolf is having troubles keeping up his human form. Help him buy all of his groceries without getting caught in 9 levels + 1 bonus ;) !

Extra Challenge: Try to beat the developers time record.

Ludum Dare

This is our entry to the 49th Ludum Dare gamejam. We, a two person team, created all of the assets, excluding the font.

The theme this time was "Unstable". In our game you play a werewolf with an unstable human form.

How to play

There is also a visual guide in the game.

Controls:

  • Move with W, A, S, D
  • Transform back and forth with J
  • Delay your transformation back into a werewolf by spamming Space
  • In your wolf form Space will also transform you into a human
  • Pick up items by holding E or K

Programming by Timur Bahadir

Music and Art by Anja Dannenberg
